Legislative History of Laws

Delegation of Authority

Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-136, see Mayor's Order 86-9, January 16, 1986.

DC CODE ยง 32-415

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall issue, and may amend from time to time, rules and regulations to implement the provisions of this chapter.
By issuance of a Mayor's Order, the Mayor may delegate the powers and duties assigned to the Mayor by this chapter.

heading.catch_text: Rules and regulations; delegation of authority.
